note: Decent human bean. Mom of 4 awesome people and 2 orange cat caregivers. Jaded idealist. Introvert who's embarrassingly obsessed with up to the minute news on the political implosion of this country. So basic af I guess. Stage 4. Hoping to see "he who shall not be named" go down before I go out. Oh yeah and wandering around lost on Mastadon like a typical 55 yr old newbie as the kids would say.
